synopsis.text: Drama unfolds both on and off-stage in the anime "Hitohira," which follows the journey of Asai Mugi, a timid first-year student at Kumataka arts academy. Mugi's debilitating shyness often renders her speechless, but her life takes an unexpected turn when she is discovered by the Drama Research Society's president, Ichinose Nono, who is captivated by Mugi's powerful voice. Despite her initial reluctance, Mugi is persuaded to join the club, where she is thrust into the spotlight and must perform multiple roles in the club's upcoming plays due to the limited number of members. As the story progresses, Mugi's character evolves under the influence of her fellow club members, pushing her to confront her fears and grow beyond her initial timidity. Will Mugi's transformation allow her to embrace the stage and find her voice in the world of drama? Join her in this heartwarming tale of self-discovery and friendship as she navigates the challenges of high school and the thrilling world of theater.
